name: kanba
tagline: A kanban style project management app for small teams
description: Kanba is a kanban style project and task management application with multi user support. It lets teams organize boards, track work in progress and comment on tasks, offering a Trello like experience on self hosted infrastructure.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multi-user support with task comments and activity tracking. Coordinate team projects effectively

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Labels, tags, due dates, and assignees for comprehensive task tracking. Monitor work in progress with

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Pre-configured board layouts for common workflows and project types. Start projects faster

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload files and images directly to task cards. Keep all project assets in one place

features.title: Activity Feed
features.description: Real-time updates on task changes, comments, and team actions. Stay informed about project progress

features.title: Archive & History
features.description: Archive completed tasks and view historical changes. Maintain project records over time
